title: Snake Plant
description: A resilient plant perfect for beginners, known for its striking upright leaves and air-purifying abilities.

title: Peace Lily
description: Elegant and serene, this flowering plant thrives in shade and improves indoor air quality.

title: Spider Plant
description: A classic favorite that sprouts baby 'spiders' and helps purify the air.

title: Pothos
description: A fast-growing vine with heart-shaped leaves, perfect for hanging baskets or shelves.

title: ZZ Plant
description: Glossy, drought-tolerant leaves make this plant nearly indestructible and very stylish.

title: Aloe Vera
description: Succulent plant with healing properties, ideal for sunny windowsills.

title: Chinese Evergreen
description: A striking foliage plant that tolerates poor lighting and adds color to any room.

title: Dieffenbachia
description: Lush and tropical with large leaves, ideal for shaded corners and low light environments.

title: Bamboo Palm
description: Tropical charm and air-cleaning benefits in a low-maintenance palm.

title: Calathea
description: Known for its vibrant patterned leaves and movement throughout the day.

title: Anthurium
description: Bright waxy flowers and heart-shaped leaves make this plant a standout.

title: Boston Fern
description: Lush, feathery fronds create a classic and refreshing indoor look.

title: Dracaena
description: An elegant upright plant with long striped leaves, great for homes and offices.

title: Orchid
description: Delicate and exotic blooms that last for weeks with minimal care.
